translated: “A son has been born to you for the sake of realizing enlightenment.”

original: lha yi ngag dag bdag gi nyi ma'i lam du thos //
analyzed: lha yi ngag dag bdag gi nyi ma'i lam du thos //
translated: These were the words of the gods that I heard on my way here.

original: ngag de thos nas dang ni yid la bsgoms nas dang // mtshan ma rnams kyis shes nas de nas nye bar 'ongs //
analyzed: ngag de thos nas dang ni yid la bsgoms nas dang // mtshan ma rnams kyis shes nas de nas nye bar 'ongs //
translated: “Having heard these words and contemplated them, and having understood through signs, I have come here.

original: brgya byin gyi ni rgyal mtshan yang dag bsgreng ba bzhin //
analyzed: brgya byin gyi ni rgyal mtshan yang dag bsgreng ba bzhin //
translated: Like Indra’s banner raised high,

original: sh'akya'i rigs kyi rgyal mtshan blta bar 'dod pa yis //
analyzed: sh'akya'i rigs kyi rgyal mtshan blta bar 'dod pa yis //
translated: “I wish to see the banner of the Śākya clan.

original: zhes pa'i tshig 'di de ltar thos par gyur nas ni //
analyzed: zhes pa'i tshig 'di de ltar thos par gyur nas ni //
translated: Having heard these words,

original: mi dbang rab tu dga' bas kun nas g-yos gyur te ;
analyzed: mi dbang rab tu dga' bas kun nas g-yos gyur te ;
translated: the lord of men was filled with joy.

original: / yum gyi pang du son las gzhon nu blangs nas ni //
analyzed: / yum gyi pang du son las gzhon nu blangs nas ni //
translated: He took the prince from his mother’s lap

original: dka' thub nor can la ni yang dag bstan par gyur //
analyzed: dka' thub nor can la ni yang dag bstan par gyur //
translated: and showed him to the sage who possessed the wealth of austerities.

original: de nas drang srong che des zhabs la 'khor los mtshan //
analyzed: de nas drang srong che des zhabs la 'khor los mtshan //
translated: Then the great sage, with the sign of a wheel on his feet,

original: phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel pa dang // glang po bzhin du mdoms nub smin ma mdzod spur bcas //
analyzed: phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'brel pa dang // glang po bzhin du mdoms nub smin ma mdzod spur bcas //
translated: His fingers and toes are connected by webs, like a goose’s; his male organ is concealed, like that of a horse; he has hair between his eyebrows, and a protuberance on the crown of his head.

original: ya mtshan dang bcas rgyal po'i sras ni mthong bar gyur //
analyzed: ya mtshan dang bcas rgyal po'i sras ni mthong bar gyur //
translated: The king’s son is seen to have these wondrous marks.

original: lha mo'i pang na zhugs pa me yi bu bzhin du //
analyzed: lha mo'i pang na zhugs pa me yi bu bzhin du //
translated: He is like the son of Agni, born from the lap of a goddess.

original: ma ma'i pang du bzhugs pa mngon par mthong nas ni //
analyzed: ma ma'i pang du bzhugs pa mngon par mthong nas ni //
translated: Seeing him seated on the lap of his nurse,

original: byung gyur rdzi ma'i mtha' ru mchi ma rnams byung ste //
analyzed: byung gyur rdzi ma'i mtha' ru mchi ma rnams byung ste //
translated: tears flow from his eyes to the ends of his lashes.

original: dbugs med gyur nas gyen du lta la zhal phyogs gyur //
analyzed: dbugs med gyur nas gyen du lta la zhal phyogs gyur //
translated: He turns his face upward, as if to look at the sky;

original: mig dag mchi mas yongs gang dkar min mthong nas ni //
analyzed: mig dag mchi mas yongs gang dkar min mthong nas ni //
translated: his eyes are filled with tears, and he is not his usual self.

original: bu la brtse ba'i phyir ni mi skyong 'dar gyur te //🔽mchi ma dang ni gri ba kha zhing ldab ldib bcas //
analyzed: bu la brtse ba'i phyir ni mi skyong 'dar gyur te // mchi ma dang ni gri ba kha zhing ldab ldib bcas //
translated: The king trembles with love for his son;🔽his mouth is dry, his tears flow, and he is covered with goose bumps.

original: thal mo sbyar zhing yan lag btud de dris par gyur //
analyzed: thal mo sbyar zhing yan lag btud de dris par gyur //
translated: With folded hands and bowed limbs, he asks:🔽“Whose body is between the human and the divine,

original: gang gi lus ni lha las bar na cung zad cig / rang gi skye ba ngo mtshar mang po'i sgron ma ste //
analyzed: gang gi lus ni lha las bar na cung zad cig / rang gi skye ba ngo mtshar mang po'i sgron ma ste //
translated: a lamp for many wondrous births?

original: gang gi don ni mchog tu 'gyur bar smra ba ste //
analyzed: gang gi don ni mchog tu 'gyur bar smra ba ste //
translated: For the sake of the world, he said.

original: rab tu mthong nas brtan pa gang phyir mchi ma 'ong //
analyzed: rab tu mthong nas brtan pa gang phyir mchi ma 'ong //
translated: And when he saw that the steadfast one was not to be turned from his purpose, he wept.

original: bcom ldan gzhon nu brtan pa'i tshe can yin snyam mam //
analyzed: bcom ldan gzhon nu brtan pa'i tshe can yin snyam mam //
translated: Is the Lord Buddha, then, a mere boy?

original: bdag gi mya ngan ched du skyes pa min nam ci //
analyzed: bdag gi mya ngan ched du skyes pa min nam ci //
translated: Or is he born for my sorrow?

original: bdag la chu yi snyim ba ci zhig ltar rnyed de //
analyzed: bdag la chu yi snyim ba ci zhig ltar rnyed de //
translated: How can I find a handful of water?

original: 'di ni dus kyis 'thung phyir nye bar 'ongs ma yin //
analyzed: 'di ni dus kyis 'thung phyir nye bar 'ongs ma yin //
translated: It is not for that that he has come to me at this time.

original: @5b bdag gi snyan grags gter ni mi zad yin snyam mam //
analyzed: @5b bdag gi snyan grags gter ni mi zad yin snyam mam //
translated: Is he a treasure of fame that will never fail?

original: nges par bdag gi rigs kyi lag nor yin snyam ci //
analyzed: nges par bdag gi rigs kyi lag nor yin snyam ci //
translated: Is he a family heirloom?

original: bde bar pha rol du ni rab tu 'gro snyam mam //
analyzed: bde bar pha rol du ni rab tu 'gro snyam mam //
translated: Is he one who will go to the other world in comfort?

original: gnyid par gyur kyang bu ni phye ba'i mig gcig yod //
analyzed: gnyid par gyur kyang bu ni phye ba'i mig gcig yod //
translated: Though he sleeps, he has one eye open.

original: bdag gi rigs kyi myu gru skyes pa ma rgyas par //
analyzed: bdag gi rigs kyi myu gru skyes pa ma rgyas par //
translated: Is he a shoot of my family that will not grow?

original: yongs su skams pa'i skal ba can zhig min snyam mam //
analyzed: yongs su skams pa'i skal ba can zhig min snyam mam //
translated: Is he one who is fated to wither away?

original: khyab bdag myur bar gsungs shig bdag la zhi ba med //
analyzed: khyab bdag myur bar gsungs shig bdag la zhi ba med //
translated: Tell me quickly, O Lord, I am beside myself.

original: gnyen 'dun rnams kyis bu la brtse ba khyed kyis rig / de ltar mi 'dod blo yis 'khrul pa byung gyur pa //
analyzed: gnyen 'dun rnams kyis bu la brtse ba khyed kyis rig / de ltar mi 'dod blo yis 'khrul pa byung gyur pa //
translated: But such a desire is a delusion.

original: rig nas mi dbang rgyal la thub pa des smras pa //
analyzed: rig nas mi dbang rgyal la thub pa des smras pa //
translated: The Sage, having understood this, said to the king:

original: bdag gis smras pa gang de the tshom med pa de //
analyzed: bdag gis smras pa gang de the tshom med pa de //
translated: “What I have said is without doubt.🔽“May your mind, O king, not turn to anything else.

original: mi skyong khyed kyi blo gros gzhan gang ma gyur cig /'di yi gzhan gyur mtshon min bdag gi rnam 'gyur te //
analyzed: mi skyong khyed kyi blo gros gzhan gang ma gyur cig /'di yi gzhan gyur mtshon min bdag gi rnam 'gyur te //
translated: This is not a sign of my displeasure, but of my agitation.

original: 'on kyang rang la slu bar rab mtshon rnam par 'khrugs //
analyzed: 'on kyang rang la slu bar rab mtshon rnam par 'khrugs //
translated: But it is a clear sign that I am deceiving myself.

original: skye ba zad pa'i rnyed par bla min rtogs pa po //
analyzed: skye ba zad pa'i rnyed par bla min rtogs pa po //
translated: I have not attained the state of one who has exhausted birth.

original: 'di skyes bdag gi 'gro ba la ni dus yin no //
analyzed: 'di skyes bdag gi 'gro ba la ni dus yin no //
translated: The time has come for me to go.

original: rgyal srid rnam bar spangs nas yul rnams la mi gnas //
analyzed: rgyal srid rnam bar spangs nas yul rnams la mi gnas //
translated: I will renounce the kingdom and not remain in the country.

original: 'bad pa drag po rnams kyis de nyid thob byas nas //🔽'di ni 'gro la gti mug mun pa rnam 'joms phyir //
analyzed: 'bad pa drag po rnams kyis de nyid thob byas nas // 'di ni 'gro la gti mug mun pa rnam 'joms phyir //
translated: Having attained reality through intense effort,🔽I will be a sun that blazes with the light of knowledge

original: ye shes rang bzhin nyi ma rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur //
analyzed: ye shes rang bzhin nyi ma rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur //
translated: In order to destroy the darkness of delusion in the world.”

original: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho nad rnams bkram pa'i dbu ba can //
analyzed: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho nad rnams bkram pa'i dbu ba can //
translated: The ocean of suffering, with its waves of old age,

original: rga ba'i dpa' rlabs 'chi ba'i shugs ni drag po las //
analyzed: rga ba'i dpa' rlabs 'chi ba'i shugs ni drag po las //
translated: And its fierce, powerful current of death.🔽This great ship of wisdom

original: 'gro ba nyam thag bying bar gyur rnams 'di yis ni //🔽ye shes gru bo chen po yis ni sgrol bar byed //
analyzed: 'gro ba nyam thag bying bar gyur rnams 'di yis ni // ye shes gru bo chen po yis ni sgrol bar byed //
translated: Liberates the helpless beings who are drowning in it.

original: shes rab chu yi shugs la brten pa'i tshul khrims dogs //
analyzed: shes rab chu yi shugs la brten pa'i tshul khrims dogs //
translated: The sail of morality is hoisted on the wind of wisdom,

original: ting nge 'dzin ni bsil ba'i brtul zhugs ngang pa 'phyo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ni bsil ba'i brtul zhugs ngang pa 'phyo //
translated: And the geese of meditative concentration joyfully fly.🔽The river of this supreme Dharma,

original: 'di yi mchog gi chos kyi chu bos rab bskor la //
analyzed: 'di yi mchog gi chos kyi chu bos rab bskor la //
translated: Which flows with the water of the Dharma,

original: sred pas nyam thag gson pa'i 'jig rten 'thung bar byed //
analyzed: sred pas nyam thag gson pa'i 'jig rten 'thung bar byed //
translated: Satisfies the world, which is tormented by craving.🔽Those who are tormented by suffering, those who are obscured by objects,

original: sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag dang yul gyis bsgribs rnams dang // 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon 'jigs par gnas pa rnams la ni //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag dang yul gyis bsgribs rnams dang // 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon 'jigs par gnas pa rnams la ni //
translated: And those who are in the terrifying jungle of cyclic existence,

original: lam rab chud zos rnams la lam 'gro rnams bzhin du//
analyzed: lam rab chud zos rnams la lam 'gro rnams bzhin du//
translated: Are like travelers who have lost their way.🔽This [Dharma] is like a guide for them.

original: 'dis ni rnam par dag pa'i lam dag 'chad par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'dis ni rnam par dag pa'i lam dag 'chad par 'gyur //
translated: This [Dharma] teaches the path of purification.

original: yul gyi bud shing can gyi 'dod chags me yis ni //
analyzed: yul gyi bud shing can gyi 'dod chags me yis ni //
translated: The fire of desire, which has objects as its fuel,

original: 'jig rten skye bo rnam par bsregs par gyur pa la //
analyzed: 'jig rten skye bo rnam par bsregs par gyur pa la //
translated: Just as a great cloud in the last month of summer

original: sos ka'i tha mar sprin chen gyis ni char bzhin du //
analyzed: sos ka'i tha mar sprin chen gyis ni char bzhin du //
translated: quenches the great burning of the people of the world.

original: 'di yi chos kyi char gyis rab tu sim byed 'gyur //
analyzed: 'di yi chos kyi char gyis rab tu sim byed 'gyur //
translated: This one, with the rain of the Dharma, will bring relief.

original: sred pa'i sgo @6a * //
analyzed: sred pa'i sgo @6a * //
translated: The door of craving,

original: gtan ma rig mun pa'i sgo glegs can //
analyzed: gtan ma rig mun pa'i sgo glegs can //
translated: the bolt of the darkness of ignorance,

original: sgo la skye dgu rnams kyi 'thon pa'i rgyu las ni //🔽'di yis mchog rab kun nas rnyed par dka' ba yi //
analyzed: sgo la skye dgu rnams kyi 'thon pa'i rgyu las ni // 'di yis mchog rab kun nas rnyed par dka' ba yi //
translated: the door of the people’s going out,🔽this one will open with the sound of the Dharma,

original: dam pa'i chos kyi sgras ni rnam par 'byed bar 'gyur //
analyzed: dam pa'i chos kyi sgras ni rnam par 'byed bar 'gyur //
translated: which is most excellent and difficult to find.

original: rang gi las kyi zhags pa rnams kyis yongs dkris shing//
analyzed: rang gi las kyi zhags pa rnams kyis yongs dkris shing//
translated: Completely bound by the noose of their own karma,

original: sdug bsngal dag gis mngon par zil non rten med pa'i //
analyzed: sdug bsngal dag gis mngon par zil non rten med pa'i //
translated: overwhelmed by suffering, without support,

original: 'jig rten rnams kyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes nas kyang //
analyzed: 'jig rten rnams kyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes nas kyang //
translated: the people of the world, having attained perfect awakening,

original: chos kyi rgyal po 'dis ni 'ching ba mthar mdzad 'gyur //
analyzed: chos kyi rgyal po 'dis ni 'ching ba mthar mdzad 'gyur //
translated: will be freed from bondage by this Dharma King.

original: rmongs sam 'dod pa'i bde ba yis sam rgyags las rung //
analyzed: rmongs sam 'dod pa'i bde ba yis sam rgyags las rung //
translated: Whether out of confusion, or the happiness of desire, or intoxication,

original: 'di yi mthar thug chos gang thos par mi byed pa //
analyzed: 'di yi mthar thug chos gang thos par mi byed pa //
translated: those who do not listen to this ultimate Dharma,

original: mi yi 'jig rten 'dir de mya ngan bya ba'i gnas //
analyzed: mi yi 'jig rten 'dir de mya ngan bya ba'i gnas //
translated: In this world of humans, this is a cause for grief.

original: de phyir khyed nyid 'di la mya ngan ma byed cig / yon tan rgya mtsho 'di las 'khrul gyur bdag gi ni //
analyzed: de phyir khyed nyid 'di la mya ngan ma byed cig / yon tan rgya mtsho 'di las 'khrul gyur bdag gi ni //
translated: Therefore, you should not grieve for him.

original: bsam gtan rnams ni thob kyang don byas med nyid de //
analyzed: bsam gtan rnams ni thob kyang don byas med nyid de //
translated: “ ‘Even if I attain the dhyānas, it will be of no benefit,

original: de yi dam chos ma thos pa la kho bo ni //
analyzed: de yi dam chos ma thos pa la kho bo ni //
translated: For I have not heard the true Dharma of the Jina.

original: mtho ris dag na gnas kyang phun tshogs med pa snyam //
analyzed: mtho ris dag na gnas kyang phun tshogs med pa snyam //
translated: Even if I were to dwell in the higher realms, I would feel that it was not enough.

original: de ltar don thos bshes dang bcas shing btsun mor bcas //
analyzed: de ltar don thos bshes dang bcas shing btsun mor bcas //
translated: ’ “In this way, having heard the meaning, together with his friends and his queen,

original: yid mi bde ba dor nas mi dbang dgar gyur la //
analyzed: yid mi bde ba dor nas mi dbang dgar gyur la //
translated: The king cast off his sorrow and became happy.

original: rnam pa de ltar bdag gi bu ni 'di'o zhes //
analyzed: rnam pa de ltar bdag gi bu ni 'di'o zhes //
translated: ‘This is my son, who is like this.’

original: des ni bdag nyid la ni snying po ldan par bsams //
analyzed: des ni bdag nyid la ni snying po ldan par bsams //
translated: He thought that he himself had become meaningful.

original: 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyis kyang 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyis kyang 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes //
translated: ‘He will go forth and practice the Dharma of the noble ones.’

original: bsam pa'i rnam par gzung bya snying la byas gyur te //
analyzed: bsam pa'i rnam par gzung bya snying la byas gyur te //
translated: He kept this thought in his heart.

original: nges par 'di ni mi sdug chos kyi phyogs min la //
analyzed: nges par 'di ni mi sdug chos kyi phyogs min la //
translated: ‘He is certainly not on the side of unwholesome qualities.

original: rigs rgyud nyams pa las ni 'on kyang 'jigs pa mthong //
analyzed: rigs rgyud nyams pa las ni 'on kyang 'jigs pa mthong //
translated: But he saw danger in the decline of the family line.

original: de nas bu la rnam par 'khrugs pa'i rgyal po la //
analyzed: de nas bu la rnam par 'khrugs pa'i rgyal po la //
translated: Then, the king, who was furious with his son,

original: bu yi nges pa'i de nyid rig par byas nas su //
analyzed: bu yi nges pa'i de nyid rig par byas nas su //
translated: having ascertained the truth about his son,

original: gus bcas gyen du gzugs mthong dkar min thub pa ni //
analyzed: gus bcas gyen du gzugs mthong dkar min thub pa ni //
translated: with respect looked up to see the dark-hued sage,

original: rlung gi lam gyis ji ltar 'ongs par gshegs par gyur //
analyzed: rlung gi lam gyis ji ltar 'ongs par gshegs par gyur //
translated: and went by the path of the wind as he had come.

original: blo gros byas pa'i sring mo'i bu yang mthong nas ni //
analyzed: blo gros byas pa'i sring mo'i bu yang mthong nas ni //
translated: Having seen the son of his sister, who was created by his own mind,

original: thub pa'i gsung mnyan pa dang de yi lugs la ni //
analyzed: thub pa'i gsung mnyan pa dang de yi lugs la ni //
translated: and having listened to the words of the sage, and in his system

original: rnam mang rjes su brtse ba yis ni legs pa des /
analyzed: rnam mang rjes su brtse ba yis ni legs pa des /
translated: with much love, he was well-disposed,

original: sdug pa'i bu bzhin du ni sbyor ba byed du bcug / sras po skyes pas tshim pa'i mi yi bdag po yang //
analyzed: sdug pa'i bu bzhin du ni sbyor ba byed du bcug / sras po skyes pas tshim pa'i mi yi bdag po yang //
translated: and made him engage in practice like a beloved son. The lord of men, satisfied by the birth of a son,

original: yul la song ba'i 'ching ba rnams ni rnam spangs te //
analyzed: yul la song ba'i 'ching ba rnams ni rnam spangs te //
translated: having abandoned the bonds of going to the country,

original: sras kyi yid 'ong sras po bltams pa'i las dag ni //
analyzed: sras kyi yid 'ong sras po bltams pa'i las dag ni //
translated: with the delightful work of giving birth to a son,

original: rigs dang 'dra bar ji lta ba bzhin byed du bcug / zhag bcu yongs su 'das par @6b gyur ba nyid kyi tshe //
analyzed: rigs dang 'dra bar ji lta ba bzhin byed du bcug / zhag bcu yongs su 'das par @6b gyur ba nyid kyi tshe //
translated: When ten days had passed,

original: mchog gi dga' ba rab ldan snyoms par gyur pa'i yid //
analyzed: mchog gi dga' ba rab ldan snyoms par gyur pa'i yid //
translated: his mind, full of supreme joy, was absorbed in meditation.🔽In order that the son would become supreme,

original: sras las mchog tu 'gyur phyir lha yi mchod pa ni //
analyzed: sras las mchog tu 'gyur phyir lha yi mchod pa ni //
translated: he performed the worship of the gods,

original: bzlas brjod dang ni sbyin sreg bkra shis la sogs byas //
analyzed: bzlas brjod dang ni sbyin sreg bkra shis la sogs byas //
translated: the recitation of prayers, the burnt offerings, the benedictions, and so forth.

original: gzhan yang brgya dang stong phrag yongs su gang ba'i grangs //
analyzed: gzhan yang brgya dang stong phrag yongs su gang ba'i grangs //
translated: Moreover, he gave away a hundred thousand sons

original: brtan dang stobs ldan bu rnams gser gyi rvar bcas shing //
analyzed: brtan dang stobs ldan bu rnams gser gyi rvar bcas shing //
translated: who were full of strength and vigor,

original: rgas pa nye bar 'ongs min sva ma ldan pa'i ba //
analyzed: rgas pa nye bar 'ongs min sva ma ldan pa'i ba //
translated: who were not yet in the grip of old age,

original: rang gi sras 'phel phyir na gnyis skyes rnams la byin //
analyzed: rang gi sras 'phel phyir na gnyis skyes rnams la byin //
translated: in order that his own sons would increase.

original: de nas snyoms pa'i bdag nyid kyis ni rnam mang yul //
analyzed: de nas snyoms pa'i bdag nyid kyis ni rnam mang yul //
translated: Then, with a mind full of equanimity,🔽he performed the various acts

original: rang sems tshim bar byed pa'i bya ba rnams byas nas //
analyzed: rang sems tshim bar byed pa'i bya ba rnams byas nas //
translated: that would satisfy his own mind.

original: yon tan ldan zhing dge ba'i yud tsam nges pa na //
analyzed: yon tan ldan zhing dge ba'i yud tsam nges pa na //
translated: When the time was right, which was auspicious and virtuous,

original: grong khyer rab tu 'jug la dga' bas blo gros mdzad //
analyzed: grong khyer rab tu 'jug la dga' bas blo gros mdzad //
translated: He entered the city with a joyful mind.

original: de nas mche gnyis mche ba las byung rin thang che //
analyzed: de nas mche gnyis mche ba las byung rin thang che //
translated: Then, from the tusks of the two elephants, there appeared two very valuable🔽gems,

original: dkar po'i me tog gis spras nor bu'i sgron //
analyzed: dkar po'i me tog gis spras nor bu'i sgron //
translated: adorned with white flowers, like lamps.

original: khri la dge ba'i phyir ni lha mo sras ldan ma //
analyzed: khri la dge ba'i phyir ni lha mo sras ldan ma //
translated: For the sake of virtue, the goddess Śrī, who has a son,

original: lha rnams la ni rab tu btud nas bsnyen par gyur //
analyzed: lha rnams la ni rab tu btud nas bsnyen par gyur //
translated: bowed to the gods and approached.

original: de nas gnas brtan skye mo rjes 'brang sras mgon ma //
analyzed: de nas gnas brtan skye mo rjes 'brang sras mgon ma //
translated: Then, the elder Śākyamuni, the protector of his son,

original: bdag po ldan ma grong la mdun du rab zhugs nas //
analyzed: bdag po ldan ma grong la mdun du rab zhugs nas //
translated: entered the city in front, accompanied by his wife.

original: mchod ldan lha na lha rnams kyis ni brgya byin bzhin //
analyzed: mchod ldan lha na lha rnams kyis ni brgya byin bzhin //
translated: Like Śakra by the gods, he was worshipped by the people.

original: mi bdag nyid kyang grong ba'i tshogs kyis gshegs par gyur //
analyzed: mi bdag nyid kyang grong ba'i tshogs kyis gshegs par gyur //
translated: The lord of men also proceeded, surrounded by the assembly of citizens.

original: de nas gdong drug skyes pas yid ches dbang phyug bzhin //
analyzed: de nas gdong drug skyes pas yid ches dbang phyug bzhin //

analyzed: lha mchog ma yi gar dang mnyam pa'i gar rnams kyis //

analyzed: ti se'i gangs ltar de yi pho brang mdzes par gyur //

analyzed: ngag dang gzo dang rol dang rnam 'gyur rnams kyis kyang //

analyzed: rgyags dang rtse dang dgod pa dngar mo rnams kyis dang // smin ma bskyod pa yis dang phyed mig lta rnams kyis //

analyzed: de la der ni mi mo rnams ni dga' bar gyur //

original: de nas de ni 'dod pa bsten par mkhas pa yi //
analyzed: de nas de ni 'dod pa bsten par mkhas pa yi //

original: dga' bas dregs pa'i bud med rnams kyis bzung gyur la //
analyzed: dga' bas dregs pa'i bud med rnams kyis bzung gyur la //

original: gzhal med khang ni rgyab nas bsod nams las can bzhin //
analyzed: gzhal med khang ni rgyab nas bsod nams las can bzhin //

original: gzhal med khang ni rgyab nas sa la ma gshegs so //
analyzed: gzhal med khang ni rgyab nas sa la ma gshegs so //

original: mi skyong gis kyang de nyid bskyed pa'i ched las ni //
analyzed: mi skyong gis kyang de nyid bskyed pa'i ched las ni //
translated: The king, too, for the sake of his son’s welfare,

original: de yi 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don gyis bskul gyur te //
analyzed: de yi 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don gyis bskul gyur te //
translated: urged on by the purpose of his birth,

original: sdig pa las ni dga' bral zhi la mngon dga' zhing //
analyzed: sdig pa las ni dga' bral zhi la mngon dga' zhing //

original: legs la skal bar bgos shing dul la bsnyen par gyur //
analyzed: legs la skal bar bgos shing dul la bsnyen par gyur //

original: brtan min bzhin du 'dod pa'i bde la ma zhen la //
analyzed: brtan min bzhin du 'dod pa'i bde la ma zhen la //

analyzed: ma rungs skyed ma la ni yang dag chags ma gyur //

analyzed: brtan pas dbang po'i rta ni stobs las rnam thul zhing //

analyzed: gnyen dang grong khyer pa rnams yon tan rnams kyis rgyal ;

original: / gzhan gyi sdug bsngal phyir ni rig pa ma brjod la //
analyzed: / gzhan gyi sdug bsngal phyir ni rig pa ma brjod la //

original: ye shes dge ba gang yang de la lhag par brjod //
analyzed: ye shes dge ba gang yang de la lhag par brjod //

original: des ni rang gi skye dgu rnams la ji lta bar //
analyzed: des ni rang gi skye dgu rnams la ji lta bar //

original: de ltar skye dgu rnams la dge ba'i bsngags pa mdzad //
analyzed: de ltar skye dgu rnams la dge ba'i bsngags pa mdzad //

analyzed: skar ma rgyal snang shes ldan sras po lhag pa'i lha //
translated: He was the son of the wise one who was the king of the stars,

original: ji lta bar ni de yi tshe ring phyir mchod des //
analyzed: ji lta bar ni de yi tshe ring phyir mchod des //
translated: and he was worshipped for his long life.

original: chud min me la bsreg bya rnams ni bsregs gyur la //
analyzed: chud min me la bsreg bya rnams ni bsregs gyur la //
translated: He cremated the dead without fail,

original: gnyis skyes rnams la gser dang ba lang rnams kyang byin //🔽'gram stegs chab rnams kyis dang yon tan chab rnams kyis //
analyzed: gnyis skyes rnams la gser dang ba lang rnams kyang byin // 'gram stegs chab rnams kyis dang yon tan chab rnams kyis //
translated: and he gave gold and cattle to the twice-born.🔽He bathed his body and mind in the waters of the river banks and the waters of virtue,

original: gtsang sgra'i ched du lus dang yid la khrus byas te //
analyzed: gtsang sgra'i ched du lus dang yid la khrus byas te //
translated: for the sake of purity.

original: rig byed du ni nye bar bstan pa'i chad rnams dang // zhi ba bdag skyes snying la zhi ba'i bde la 'thung //
analyzed: rig byed du ni nye bar bstan pa'i chad rnams dang // zhi ba bdag skyes snying la zhi ba'i bde la 'thung //

original: gang zhig don dang mi ldan zhi ba ma smras la //
analyzed: gang zhig don dang mi ldan zhi ba ma smras la //

original: gang zhig dga' ba dang bral de nyid ma brjod de //
analyzed: gang zhig dga' ba dang bral de nyid ma brjod de //
translated: and I have not spoken of reality that is devoid of joy.

original: zhi ba de nyid med dang rtsub pa'i de nyid phyir //
analyzed: zhi ba de nyid med dang rtsub pa'i de nyid phyir //
translated: Because peace is not reality and because reality is not harsh,

analyzed: ngo tsha ba yis bdag nyid kho na brjod ma nus // don ldan 'dod pa rnams dang mi 'dod pa rnams la // chags @9a * //
translated: I have been unable to speak out of shame.🔽Those who desire what is meaningful do not obtain🔽what they want or do not want

original: pa'i skyon la brten nas rab tu 'thob min te //
analyzed: pa'i skyon la brten nas rab tu 'thob min te //
translated: on the basis of the fault of attachment.

original: dge ba'i tha snyad gtsang ma la ni bsnyen gyur la //
analyzed: dge ba'i tha snyad gtsang ma la ni bsnyen gyur la //
translated: They approach the pure conventions of virtue

original: mchod sbyin la yang ma mos de ltar ji lta bzhin //
analyzed: mchod sbyin la yang ma mos de ltar ji lta bzhin //
translated: and do not believe in sacrifice, just as they are.🔽As soon as those who are full of craving come,

analyzed: sred pa dang ldan mngon par 'ongs pa de ma thag / sbyin bya chu 'dra rnams kyis skom pa bcad gyur la ;
translated: they are satisfied with gifts that are like water.

original: / g-yul las ma gtogs ye shes kyi ni sta ri yis //
analyzed: / g-yul las ma gtogs ye shes kyi ni sta ri yis //
translated: But the axe of wisdom, not the axe of battle,

original: dgra bo rnams kyi nga rgyal chen po bcom par gyur //
analyzed: dgra bo rnams kyi nga rgyal chen po bcom par gyur //
translated: And the great pride of the enemies was destroyed.

original: gcig ni rnam par dul la des ni mdun bsrungs shing //
analyzed: gcig ni rnam par dul la des ni mdun bsrungs shing //
translated: One was completely subdued, and he protected the front;

original: bdun po nyid ni don la lnga po dag ni bsrungs //
analyzed: bdun po nyid ni don la lnga po dag ni bsrungs //
translated: The seven were for the sake of the object, and the five were protected.

original: sde tshan gsum po thob la sde tshan gsum rtogs shing ;
analyzed: sde tshan gsum po thob la sde tshan gsum rtogs shing ;
translated: The three groups were obtained, and the three groups were understood,

original: / sde tshan gnyis po shes la sde tshan gnyis po spangs //
analyzed: / sde tshan gnyis po shes la sde tshan gnyis po spangs //
translated: And the two groups were known, and the two groups were abandoned.

original: nyes pa byas kyang rab tu bskyangs nas gzhom bya la //
analyzed: nyes pa byas kyang rab tu bskyangs nas gzhom bya la //
translated: Even if they committed a fault, they were well protected and not destroyed.

original: 'tshe bar mi byed khro bas kyang ni gzigs ma yin //
analyzed: 'tshe bar mi byed khro bas kyang ni gzigs ma yin //
translated: They did not harm, and they did not look with anger.

original: de rnams dag la 'bras bu zhi bas bcings gyur la //
analyzed: de rnams dag la 'bras bu zhi bas bcings gyur la //

original: de rnams dag ni 'dor ba tshul ma yin phyir mthong //
analyzed: de rnams dag ni 'dor ba tshul ma yin phyir mthong //

original: drang srong rnams kyis mchog gi brtul zhugs spyad gyur la //
analyzed: drang srong rnams kyis mchog gi brtul zhugs spyad gyur la //
translated: The sages practiced the supreme discipline,

original: yun rings yang dag bzung ba'i sha khon zhugs rnams dor //
analyzed: yun rings yang dag bzung ba'i sha khon zhugs rnams dor //
translated: And they abandoned the grudges that had been held for a long time.

original: yon tan dri ldan snyan dngags rnams ni thob gyur la //
analyzed: yon tan dri ldan snyan dngags rnams ni thob gyur la //
translated: They obtained the fragrant qualities and the sweet poems,

original: dri ma can du byed pa'i rdul rnams rnam par dor //
analyzed: dri ma can du byed pa'i rdul rnams rnam par dor //

original: rab tu mi gnas gtor ma'i dpya ni ma blangs la ;
analyzed: rab tu mi gnas gtor ma'i dpya ni ma blangs la ;

original: / pha rol dngos po rnams la mngon par rlom ma byas //
analyzed: / pha rol dngos po rnams la mngon par rlom ma byas //
translated: And the other things were not taken as real.

original: dgra rnams la ni chos ma yin pa ma smras la //
analyzed: dgra rnams la ni chos ma yin pa ma smras la //

original: khro ba rnams ni snying gis gzung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: khro ba rnams ni snying gis gzung ba ma yin no //
translated: And the angry ones were not held in the heart.

original: zhi ba'i bdag nyid sems ni rnam par rab dang la //
analyzed: zhi ba'i bdag nyid sems ni rnam par rab dang la //
translated: The mind of peaceful nature was completely pure,

original: rnal 'byor rab tu ldan pa'i dbang po rnams ci ltar //
analyzed: rnal 'byor rab tu ldan pa'i dbang po rnams ci ltar //

analyzed: der ni de ltar sa bdag rab tu sgyur ba can //

original: 'bangs dang grong khyer ba rnams de lta nyid du byas //
analyzed: 'bangs dang grong khyer ba rnams de lta nyid du byas //
translated: And the subjects and city-dwellers were made just like that.

original: de nas mdzes pa'i 'o ma 'dzin pa dang ldan ma //
analyzed: de nas mdzes pa'i 'o ma 'dzin pa dang ldan ma //

original: grags 'dzin ma ni rang gi grags pa 'dzin ma la //
analyzed: grags 'dzin ma ni rang gi grags pa 'dzin ma la //

analyzed: zas gtsang sras po'i sras po sgra gcan sgra yi zhal //

analyzed: sgra gcan 'dzin zhes bya ba dus su skyes par gyur //

analyzed: de nas 'dod pa'i bu mnga' mchog gi yid ches te //

analyzed: de lta nyid du sras po'i sras po skyes la dga' //

analyzed: bdag gi bu yi bur gyur pa la brtse ba ni //

analyzed: bdag @9b bzhin gang las yin zhes dga' ba skyes gyur te // dus su des ni cho ga de dang de dmigs shing //

analyzed: bu la dga' ba mtho ris bzhin du 'dzegs par gyur //
translated: and he climbed the ladder of joy to heaven.

analyzed: rgyal po'i khyu mchog grags dang snyan pas mtshan rnams kyis //

analyzed: dang po'i skal ba rnams kyi lam la gnas nas ni //
translated: having taken up the path of the first class,🔽was worshipped with austerities and sacrifices,

analyzed: rgyal po'i dpal gyis dang ni dka' thub dpal gyis kyang //

analyzed: bsod nams las can de ni de nas 'bar gyur la //

original: rigs dang blo dang mdzad spyod kyis kyang gsal ba ste //
analyzed: rigs dang blo dang mdzad spyod kyis kyang gsal ba ste //

original: gzi brjid stong gi 'od zer bzhin du rab tu 'phro //
analyzed: gzi brjid stong gi 'od zer bzhin du rab tu 'phro //

translated: He worshipped the self-existent one with the mantra of worship,

analyzed: sras gnas ched du brtan pa'i dpal gyis bzlas byas shing //

analyzed: skyed 'dod skye dgu'i bdag bzhin dang po'i dus su'o//

analyzed: nye bar zhi la bsnyen zhing nges la rnam par bzod //
translated: He was intent on peace and had mastered the truth.

original: dbang ldan bzhin du yul rnams gang la ma bsnyen la //
analyzed: dbang ldan bzhin du yul rnams gang la ma bsnyen la //
translated: He was not devoted to any object, as if he were the lord of the senses.

original: yab mes bzhin du yul rnams kun la gzigs par gyur //
analyzed: yab mes bzhin du yul rnams kun la gzigs par gyur //
translated: He was like a grandfather, looking on all objects.

analyzed: des kyang bu yi ched du rgyal srid bzung gyur la //

analyzed: bu ni rigs kyi don du rigs ni grags pa'i phyir //

analyzed: grags ba mtho ris ched du mtho ris bdag nyid phyir //

analyzed: nags tshal nyid du 'gro mi 'gyur zhes mgon bslangs so //

analyzed: bdag la yang dag blangs pa'i dpal ni srung 'dod pa'i //
translated: The king, who wanted to protect the glory that he had rightly obtained,

analyzed: sa skyong rnams kyis sa la bu ni bsrung ba ste //
translated: protected his son on the earth.

original: chos ni 'dod pa'i ma yi dbang po de yis kyang //
analyzed: chos ni 'dod pa'i ma yi dbang po de yis kyang //

analyzed: yul rnams 'dor ba med par bu ni chos las bsrungs //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yul la bde ba'i ro shes thams cad kyang //

analyzed: sras skyed pa na dpe med sems pa nags su gshegs gyur te //
translated: when they have given birth to a son, go to the forest with incomparable thoughts.

analyzed: de phyir nye bar bsags pa'i las ni rtsa nas skyed pa'i phyir //
translated: Therefore, because of the roots of the accumulated karma,

analyzed: de ni zhi ba ma thob de srid dga' ba bsnyen par gyur // @10a * // sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba'i snyan dngags chen po las /

analyzed: btsun mo'i 'khor na gnas pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o /
translated: This concludes the second canto, named the “Court of the Queen,” of the great poetic narrative “Life of the Buddha.”🔽Then, after some time, he heard the soft grass,

translated: the male cuckoo’s cry, and the trees🔽in the gardens,🔽adorned with lotus ponds,

analyzed: padma'i 'byung gnas kyis brgyan des ni thos par gyur // de nas bud med skye bo rnams ni dga' ba yi //
translated: singing their natural songs.🔽Then, hearing the delightful things

original: grong khyer skyed mos tshal gyi yid 'ong dngos thos te //
analyzed: grong khyer skyed mos tshal gyi yid 'ong dngos thos te //
translated: in the city’s gardens and parks,

analyzed: khyim gyi nang du mngon par bkag pa'i glu bzhin du //
translated: like a song that is forbidden in the house,

original: phyi rol rab tu 'gro ba'i ched du blo mdzad do //
analyzed: phyi rol rab tu 'gro ba'i ched du blo mdzad do //
translated: he set his mind on going outside.

original: de nas sras su mngon brjod yid 'ong de yi ni //
analyzed: de nas sras su mngon brjod yid 'ong de yi ni //
translated: Then, that delightful son,

original: dgongs pa mi skyong gis ni nges par thos gyur nas //
analyzed: dgongs pa mi skyong gis ni nges par thos gyur nas //
translated: Having heard this, the king, who was not cultivating the thought of awakening,

analyzed: brtse ba'i phun sum tshogs pas lang tshor 'od la pa ru //
translated: and who was full of affection for his son, said to the charioteer:

analyzed: ltad mo dag la rnam par gshegs par bka' stsal to //

original: de la mngon par dris gyur de la des smras pa //
analyzed: de la mngon par dris gyur de la des smras pa //

original: mi yi skyes mchog skye dang 'chi bas 'jigs pa yi //
analyzed: mi yi skyes mchog skye dang 'chi bas 'jigs pa yi //

analyzed: thar pa'i phyir ni rab tu zhugs pa'i dge sbyong yin //

analyzed: bdag ni 'gro ba zad pa'i chos ni thar 'dod cing //

analyzed: dge zhing 'gyur ba med pa'i gnas de tshol ba ste //

original: rang gi skye bo dang ni skye bor mnyam pa'i blo //
analyzed: rang gi skye bo dang ni skye bor mnyam pa'i blo //

analyzed: yul rnams la ni chags pa'i nyes pa phyir log pa'o //

original: skye bo med pa'i gnas khang dang ni ri 'am nags //
analyzed: skye bo med pa'i gnas khang dang ni ri 'am nags //

analyzed: shing gi rtsa ba 'ga' zhig tu ni gnas pa yi //
translated: or at the foot of a tree, in some solitary place.

original: don dam phyir ni ji ltar nyer ldan slong mo ba //
analyzed: don dam phyir ni ji ltar nyer ldan slong mo ba //
translated: “I am a mendicant who is content with whatever comes,

original: sred bral yongs su 'dzin pa med par rnam par rgyu //
analyzed: sred bral yongs su 'dzin pa med par rnam par rgyu //
translated: free from craving, and unattached.

original: de ltar gzigs pa'i rgyal po'i sras po de nyid la //
analyzed: de ltar gzigs pa'i rgyal po'i sras po de nyid la //
translated: “The prince, who saw things in this way,

analyzed: 'di skad smras nas nam mkha' la ni gshegs par gyur //
translated: said this and then departed into the sky.

original: de ni de yi lus kyis sangs rgyas gzhan gzigs @18b shing ;
analyzed: de ni de yi lus kyis sangs rgyas gzhan gzigs @18b shing ;
translated: “With his body he saw other buddhas

original: / lha na gnas pa de yi dran pa'i ched du 'ongs //
analyzed: / lha na gnas pa de yi dran pa'i ched du 'ongs //
translated: “In order to remind him of the gods, he came.

original: mkha' la mkha' 'gro bzhin du gshegs pa de la ni //
analyzed: mkha' la mkha' 'gro bzhin du gshegs pa de la ni //
translated: He went like a sky-goer through the sky,

original: mi mchog yang dag dga' bar gyur zhing ya mtshan gyur //
analyzed: mi mchog yang dag dga' bar gyur zhing ya mtshan gyur //
translated: and the best of men was delighted and amazed.

original: de nas chos kyi 'du shes nye bar thob gyur nas //
analyzed: de nas chos kyi 'du shes nye bar thob gyur nas //
translated: “Then, having attained the perception of the Dharma,

original: mngon par nges 'byung cho ga la ni blo gros mdzad //
analyzed: mngon par nges 'byung cho ga la ni blo gros mdzad //
translated: he set his mind on the rite of definite renunciation.

original: de nas dbang po dang mnyam dbang po'i rta thul ba //
analyzed: de nas dbang po dang mnyam dbang po'i rta thul ba //
translated: Then, like Indra, the tamer of the horse of the senses,

original: grong la rab tu 'jug 'dod rta la rab 'dzegs shing //
analyzed: grong la rab tu 'jug 'dod rta la rab 'dzegs shing //
translated: he mounted the horse, desiring to enter the city,

original: 'khor gyi skye bo dag kyang mngon par 'dod pa ste //
analyzed: 'khor gyi skye bo dag kyang mngon par 'dod pa ste //
translated: and the people of the retinue also desired it,

original: de nyid phyir na mngon 'dod nags ni ma bsnyen to //
analyzed: de nyid phyir na mngon 'dod nags ni ma bsnyen to //
translated: so he did not approach the desired forest.

original: de ni rga dang 'chi ba zad par byed 'dod pa //
analyzed: de ni rga dang 'chi ba zad par byed 'dod pa //
translated: “He, desiring to end old age and death,

original: nags su gnas phyir blo gros dran pa la bzung nas /
analyzed: nags su gnas phyir blo gros dran pa la bzung nas /
translated: having taken hold of mindfulness and intelligence for dwelling in the forest,

original: gnyis 'thung dbang po nags kyi sa nas grong du ltar //
analyzed: gnyis 'thung dbang po nags kyi sa nas grong du ltar //
translated: like the lord of the elephants, from the forest to the city,

original: 'dod pa las min grong la slar yang rab tu zhugs //
analyzed: 'dod pa las min grong la slar yang rab tu zhugs //
translated: did not return to the city because of desire.🔽“

analyzed: de ni yang dag mthong nas sh'akya'i bu mo zhig / rab zhugs lam la thal mo sbyar ba dang bcas shing //

original: kye ma spyan dbang gang gi bdag po 'di 'dra 'dir //
analyzed: kye ma spyan dbang gang gi bdag po 'di 'dra 'dir //
translated: and said, “Ah! The lord of the eye faculty is like this here.

original: mo de bde ma mya ngan 'das ma zhes smras so //
analyzed: mo de bde ma mya ngan 'das ma zhes smras so //
translated: Is that woman happy? Is she in nirvāṇa?”

original: de nas dbyangs 'di sprin chen dbyangs dang ldan pa yis //
analyzed: de nas dbyangs 'di sprin chen dbyangs dang ldan pa yis //
translated: Then, the one with a voice like the sound of a great cloud

original: yongs su thos nas mchog tu zhi ba rnyed gyur la //
analyzed: yongs su thos nas mchog tu zhi ba rnyed gyur la //
translated: having heard this song, attained supreme peace.

original: mya ngan 'das zhes sgra skad thos pa dang ldan des //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das zhes sgra skad thos pa dang ldan des //
translated: The one who heard the sound of the word “nirvāṇa”

original: yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba'i chos gar blo gros mdzad //
analyzed: yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba'i chos gar blo gros mdzad //
translated: directed his mind to the Dharma of complete nirvāṇa.

analyzed: de nas gser gyi ri bo'i rtse mo'i sku mnga' zhing // glang chen phyag dang 'brug gi sgra dbyangs khyu mchog spyan //
translated: Then, having a body on the peak of a golden mountain,🔽with the hands of an elephant, the voice of thunder, the eyes of a bull,

original: seng ge'i stobs dang ri bong can gyi zhal mnga' bas //
analyzed: seng ge'i stobs dang ri bong can gyi zhal mnga' bas //
translated: the strength of a lion, and the face of the moon,

original: mi zad chos la chags skyes po brang rab tu 'thob //
analyzed: mi zad chos la chags skyes po brang rab tu 'thob //

original: de nas mtho ris dag na lha yi 'dun sa ru //
analyzed: de nas mtho ris dag na lha yi 'dun sa ru //
translated: Then, in the divine assembly in the heavens,

analyzed: lha dbang 'bar ba la ni bkug 'gyed gzhon nu bzhin //

analyzed: blon po'i tshogs kyis nye bar bsnyen pa'i mi bdag la //

analyzed: ri dags dbang po'i 'gros dang ldan pa mngon par gshegs //

original: rab tu btud nas thal mo dang bcas smras gyur ba //
analyzed: rab tu btud nas thal mo dang bcas smras gyur ba //

analyzed: mi dbang bdag la legs par rjes su gnang ba byin //

original: nges par skye bo 'di ni rnam par 'bral ba ste //
analyzed: nges par skye bo 'di ni rnam par 'bral ba ste //

original: thar pa'i ched du yongs su rnam par gshegs par bgyi //
analyzed: thar pa'i ched du yongs su rnam par gshegs par bgyi //

original: ka ma la dang rab mtshungs thal mo dag bzung nas //
analyzed: ka ma la dang rab mtshungs thal mo dag bzung nas //

original: mchi ma dang ni gre ba kha zhing tshig 'di smras //
analyzed: mchi ma dang ni gre ba kha zhing tshig 'di smras //

analyzed: brtse ba'i blo gros 'di ni rab tu thong mdzod cig / khyed kyi chos la bsnyen pa'i dus ni ma yin te //
translated: O Loving One, give up this idea! This is not the time to attend to your Dharma.

original: na tshod dang @19a * //
analyzed: na tshod dang @19a * //
translated: At this age,

original: po dang ni blo gros g-yo ba na //
analyzed: po dang ni blo gros g-yo ba na //

analyzed: chos kyi spyod pa gsungs pa rnams ni skyon mang ngo //

analyzed: yul rnams su ni dbang po ya mtshan glo bur zhing //

analyzed: brtul zhugs g-yo ba rnams su nges par nus med la //
translated: and in the fickle observances, you are certainly powerless.

original: khyad par du ni dben par mngon par mi shes pa //
analyzed: khyad par du ni dben par mngon par mi shes pa //

analyzed: dar la bab pa'i yid ni dgon pa nas g-yo'o //

analyzed: mtshon gyur khyod la phun sum tshogs pa gtad nas ni //

analyzed: kho bo yi yang chos dga' chos kyi dus yin te //
translated: it is time for me, too, to delight in the Dharma and the Dharma alone.

analyzed: rnam par gnon pa bstan pa rnam par gnon pa yis //

analyzed: bla ma spangs nas khyod kyi chos kyis chos ma yin //

analyzed: khyod ni re zhig khyim gnas chos la dga' bar gyis //

analyzed: dar la bab bas bde ba rnams ni longs spyad nas //

analyzed: de ltar rgyal po'i tshig 'di rnam par gsan nas ni //

analyzed: ka la ping ka'i dbyangs kyis lan ni smras pa ste //

analyzed: rgyal po gal te bdag gi khas len bzhi rnams su //

analyzed: khyed kyis 'gyur na dka' thub nags ni mi bsnyen to //
translated: I will not go to the forest of asceticism.

analyzed: bdag gi srog ni 'chi ba nyid du mi 'gyur zhing //

analyzed: bdag gi rang gnas gyur 'di nad kyis mi 'phrogs la //

analyzed: bdag gi lang tsho rgas pa yis ni mi g-yeng zhing //

analyzed: de ltar rnyed par dka' ba'i don smras gyur pa yi //

analyzed: sras po la ni sh'akya'i rgyal pos tshig smras pa //

analyzed: shin tu rab tu zhugs pa'i blo 'di thong mdzod cig / shin tu yid la re ba 'phya zhing sha thang 'chad //

analyzed: de nas lhun po ltar lcis bla ma la smras pa //

analyzed: gal te rim pa de dag med de shol mi thebs //

analyzed: 'bar ba'i me yis tshig pa'i khang pa nas //

analyzed: gang gi tshe na 'gro ba nges par 'bral ba ste //

analyzed: chos phyir ma yin 'di ni rnam par 'bral ba mchog /'o na bdag la 'chi bas dbang med 'bral byed cing //

analyzed: rang gi don ma byas shing tshim pa ma yin nyid //

analyzed: de ltar mthar bzhed sras po de yis nges pa ni //

analyzed: sa yi bdag po yis ni nges par thos nas ni //

analyzed: slar yang bsrung ba dag ni 'dod pa mchog rnams mdzad //

analyzed: dga' zhi zhi ba sngon 'gro bskur sti mang po las // @19b blon po rnams kyis ji lta ba bzhin dpe bstan zhing ;

original: / bla mas mchi ma lhung ba rnams kyis shol btab ste //
analyzed: / bla mas mchi ma lhung ba rnams kyis shol btab ste //
translated: And the guru, with tears falling, gave him permission.

analyzed: de nas de ni mya ngan bzhin du khyim la zhugs // rna lung 'khyil pa g-yo bas 'o byas gdong ldan ma //

original: dbugs rlung stug pos rnam par bskyod pa'i nu ma can //
analyzed: dbugs rlung stug pos rnam par bskyod pa'i nu ma can //
translated: her breasts swaying with the heavy breath.

original: bstan pa min pa'i mig ldan bud med rnams kyis ni //
analyzed: bstan pa min pa'i mig ldan bud med rnams kyis ni //
translated: The women, their eyes unblinking,

analyzed: ri dags mo rnams kyis bzhin mngon par gyen du lta //
translated: looked up like does.

original: gser gyi ri bo dang 'dra dkar ser mdog de ni //
analyzed: gser gyi ri bo dang 'dra dkar ser mdog de ni //

analyzed: yan lag mchog ma rnams kyi snying ni myos mdzad cing //

analyzed: ngag dang reg bya dang ni lus dang yon tan gyis //

analyzed: thos byed lus dang lta byed bdag gi dngos rnams phrogs ;
translated: they stole the ears, bodies, and eyes of the men.

analyzed: / nyin mo rnam par thal tshe de nas khang bzangs la //
translated: Then, when the day was over,

analyzed: lus kyis nyi ma bzhin du mngon par gsal ba ni //

original: rab rib rnam par 'joms 'dod bdag nyid snang ba yis //
analyzed: rab rib rnam par 'joms 'dod bdag nyid snang ba yis //
translated: with its light, as if to destroy the darkness,

analyzed: nyi ma shar ba lhun po la bzhin kun nas 'dzegs //

analyzed: gser gyis 'bar zhing gsal ba'i sgron ma'i shing dang ni //
translated: And trees that were lamps, shining and radiant with gold,

analyzed: aa ga ru mchog nag po'i bdug pas gang ba'i ltor // mngon par 'dzegs nas rdo rjes spras shing sna tshogs pa //

analyzed: rab mchog gser gyi bzhugs gdan la ni bsnyen pa'o //
translated: Adorned with diamonds and various things, he sat down.

analyzed: zla ba ltar dkar gangs dang ldan pa'i rtse mo na //
translated: On the peak of the snow-capped Himalayas, white like the moon,

analyzed: nor dbang bdag nyid skyes la lha mo'i tshogs 'dus bzhin //
translated: The lord of wealth, like the assembled host of goddesses,🔽Then the supreme bodies, like the senses, supreme,

analyzed: de nas lus mchog ma rnams dbang po dang mtshungs mchog / de la mtshan mor sil snyan rnams kyis nye bar gnas //

analyzed: mchog rab lha yi sil snyan 'dra ba rnams kyis kyang //
translated: Even with the most excellent divine musical instruments,

original: de yang de yis bskyed par ma gyur dga' ba med //
analyzed: de yang de yis bskyed par ma gyur dga' ba med //
translated: He did not generate joy without that which gave rise to it.

original: dam pa'i don gyi bden phyir legs pa de yi ni //
analyzed: dam pa'i don gyi bden phyir legs pa de yi ni //

analyzed: mngon par nges par 'byung 'dod gang la dga' ma gyur ;
translated: He did not delight in that which was desired for manifest renunciation.

original: / de nas der ni brtul zhugs mchog gyur 'og min gyi //
analyzed: / de nas der ni brtul zhugs mchog gyur 'og min gyi //
translated: Then there, the supreme ascetic, in the Akaniṣṭha heaven,

analyzed: lha rnams kyis ni 'di yi nges pa rtogs nas ni //
translated: The gods, having understood the truth of this,

translated: This concludes the sixth canto, called “The Return of Kaṇṭhaka,” of the great poetic treatise “Entry into the Life of the Buddha.”

original: // / de nas 'dun pa ngu zhing gdong ni mchi ma can //
analyzed: // / de nas 'dun pa ngu zhing gdong ni mchi ma can //
translated: Then Chanda, weeping and his face full of tears,

original: bzlog nas nags su 'dun pa'i dka' thub chags med pa //
analyzed: bzlog nas nags su 'dun pa'i dka' thub chags med pa //
translated: turned back from the forest, his devotion to asceticism unfulfilled.

original: don kun grub pa'i lus kyis mngon par zil mnan nas //
analyzed: don kun grub pa'i lus kyis mngon par zil mnan nas //
translated: He was overcome by the body of the one who had accomplished all goals.

original: dka' thub gnas de grub pa bzhin du rab tu thob //
analyzed: dka' thub gnas de grub pa bzhin du rab tu thob //
translated: And he attained the hermitage of asceticism as if it were his own home.

original: de nas ri dags rgyal po'i 'gros can rgyal po'i sras po de //
analyzed: de nas ri dags rgyal po'i 'gros can rgyal po'i sras po de //
translated: Then the prince, who had the gait of the king of beasts,

original: ri dags gnas der ri dags bzhin du rab zhugs pa //🔽phun tshogs rnams dang bral yang lus kyi phun tshogs kyis //
analyzed: ri dags gnas der ri dags bzhin du rab zhugs pa // phun tshogs rnams dang bral yang lus kyi phun tshogs kyis //
translated: entered that hermitage of deer as if he were a deer.🔽Though he was deprived of all his royal splendor,

original: dka' thub gnas ldan kun gyi mig dag phrogs par gyur //
analyzed: dka' thub gnas ldan kun gyi mig dag phrogs par gyur //
translated: the splendor of his body captivated the eyes of all the ascetics.

original: khur ldan rnams bzhin mgo bo rnams ni phyed dud pas //
analyzed: khur ldan rnams bzhin mgo bo rnams ni phyed dud pas //
translated: Like those who carry a load, with their heads bent down,

original: lag na gnya' shing bcas par 'gro gyur ya mtshan la //
analyzed: lag na gnya' shing bcas par 'gro gyur ya mtshan la //
translated: they walked with their yokes in their hands, in wonder.

original: de bzhin 'khor los sgyur ba chung ma dang bcas pa //
analyzed: de bzhin 'khor los sgyur ba chung ma dang bcas pa //
translated: In the same way, the universal monarch, together with his wife,

original: dbang po dang mtshungs de mthong song bar ma gyur to //
analyzed: dbang po dang mtshungs de mthong song bar ma gyur to //
translated: did not go along, seeing him as if he were Indra.

original: sbyin sreg bud shing phyir ni bram ze rnams phyin nas //
analyzed: sbyin sreg bud shing phyir ni bram ze rnams phyin nas //
translated: The brahmins, having gone to fetch firewood for the sacrificial fire,

original: me tog lo 'dab rgyas pa'i lag pa gtsang ma rnams //
analyzed: me tog lo 'dab rgyas pa'i lag pa gtsang ma rnams //
translated: with their pure hands, which were like blossoming leaves,

original: dka' thub gtso bo rnams ni blo rnams byas na yang //
analyzed: dka' thub gtso bo rnams ni blo rnams byas na yang //
translated: though they had made up their minds to be the foremost in asceticism,

original: gshegs pa mthong ste klog glar song bar ma gyur to //
analyzed: gshegs pa mthong ste klog glar song bar ma gyur to //
translated: did not go along, seeing him as if he were a sacrificial post.

original: chu gter sngon po bzhin du mthong nas rma bya rnams ;
analyzed: chu gter sngon po bzhin du mthong nas rma bya rnams ;
translated: Seeing him like a blue ocean, the peacocks

original: / dga' zhing gyen du dud cing skad dag 'don gyur la //
analyzed: / dga' zhing gyen du dud cing skad dag 'don gyur la //
translated: Rejoiced, raised their necks, and cried out.

original: rgya skyegs ri dags spyod ldan rnams dang ri dags rnams //
analyzed: rgya skyegs ri dags spyod ldan rnams dang ri dags rnams //
translated: The chamari deer and the other deer

original: 'bru rnams bor nas mngon par gdong phyogs gnas par gyur //🔽'od zer ldan pa shar ba lta bur 'bar ba yis //
analyzed: 'bru rnams bor nas mngon par gdong phyogs gnas par gyur // 'od zer ldan pa shar ba lta bur 'bar ba yis //
translated: Abandoned their food and stood facing him.🔽Seeing that lamp of the Ikṣvākus

original: bu ram shing pa'i rigs kyi sgron ma de mthong nas //
analyzed: bu ram shing pa'i rigs kyi sgron ma de mthong nas //
translated: Blazing like the rising sun,

original: @25a * // sbyin sreg 'jo rnams bzhos pa yin na yang //
analyzed: @25a * // sbyin sreg 'jo rnams bzhos pa yin na yang //
translated: The cows, though milked,

original: rab tu dga' ba skyes te rab tu 'jo gyur to //
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba skyes te rab tu 'jo gyur to //
translated: Rejoiced and gave more milk.

original: 'di ni nor sbyin rnams kyi brgyad pa yin nam ci //
analyzed: 'di ni nor sbyin rnams kyi brgyad pa yin nam ci //
translated: Is this the eighth Vasu?

original: tha skar dag gi nang nas gcig ni 'phos sam zhes //
analyzed: tha skar dag gi nang nas gcig ni 'phos sam zhes //
translated: Or is one of the Aśvins missing?

original: de mthong ba la ya mtshan skyes par gyur pa yi //
analyzed: de mthong ba la ya mtshan skyes par gyur pa yi //
translated: Amazed at seeing him,

original: thub pa rnams kyi tshig der mthon por sgrogs bar gyur //
analyzed: thub pa rnams kyi tshig der mthon por sgrogs bar gyur //
translated: The sages proclaimed this aloud.

original: lha yi khyu mchog gnyis pa'i lus po lta bu dang // 'jig rten rgyu dang mi rgyu'i snying po lta bu dang // gang 'dod pa yis nyi ma mngon par babs 'dra ba //
analyzed: lha yi khyu mchog gnyis pa'i lus po lta bu dang // 'jig rten rgyu dang mi rgyu'i snying po lta bu dang // gang 'dod pa yis nyi ma mngon par babs 'dra ba //
translated: Like the sun descending to the place it loves,

original: des ni nags tshal mtha' dag rab tu snang bar mdzod //
analyzed: des ni nags tshal mtha' dag rab tu snang bar mdzod //
translated: He illuminated the entire forest.

original: de nas gdung gnas bde rnams kyi ji lta bzhin ;
analyzed: de nas gdung gnas bde rnams kyi ji lta bzhin ;
translated: Then, as is proper, the one who abides in the lineage

original: / nye bar snyan gsan phab cing mngon par mchod gyur la //
analyzed: / nye bar snyan gsan phab cing mngon par mchod gyur la //
translated: Was invited and worshipped by the gods.

original: de ni chu bcas chu 'dzin lta bu'i dbyangs kyis ni //
analyzed: de ni chu bcas chu 'dzin lta bu'i dbyangs kyis ni //
translated: Then, with a voice like a cloud with rain,

original: chos 'dzin rnams la slar yang rab tu mchod par gyur //
analyzed: chos 'dzin rnams la slar yang rab tu mchod par gyur //
translated: He worshipped the Dharma holders in return.

original: de nas rnam par thar bzhed brtan pa de yis ni //
analyzed: de nas rnam par thar bzhed brtan pa de yis ni //
translated: Then, the steadfast one, desiring liberation,

original: dka' thub sna tshogs rnams la nges par rnam gzigs shing //
analyzed: dka' thub sna tshogs rnams la nges par rnam gzigs shing //
translated: Definitely surveyed the various austerities.

original: mtho ris mngon 'dod bsod nams byas pa'i skye bo yis //🔽khyab pa'i dka' thub gnas der rjes su dpyad par gyur //
analyzed: mtho ris mngon 'dod bsod nams byas pa'i skye bo yis // khyab pa'i dka' thub gnas der rjes su dpyad par gyur //
translated: The people who had made merit, desiring heaven,🔽Examined that forest of austerities.

original: dka' thub nor can rnams kyi dka' thub nags tshal der //
analyzed: dka' thub nor can rnams kyi dka' thub nags tshal der //
translated: In that forest of austerities of the wealthy ascetics,

original: dka' thub rnam par 'gyur ba rnams ni nges gnas nas //
analyzed: dka' thub rnam par 'gyur ba rnams ni nges gnas nas //
translated: The ascetics who are in a state of change,

original: rjes su gshegs pa'i dka' thub ldan pa kha cig la //
analyzed: rjes su gshegs pa'i dka' thub ldan pa kha cig la //
translated: and some who are endowed with asceticism that follows,

original: zhi bas de nyid rnam par shes bzhed 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: zhi bas de nyid rnam par shes bzhed 'di gsungs so //
translated: he taught this, saying that they know reality through peace.

original: gang phyir chos kyi cho ga 'di ni mi shes pa //
analyzed: gang phyir chos kyi cho ga 'di ni mi shes pa //
translated: Because this ritual of the Dharma is not known by them,

original: bdag gis dka' thub gnas mthong de ring snga ma'o //
analyzed: bdag gis dka' thub gnas mthong de ring snga ma'o //
translated: I saw the ascetics this morning.

original: de phyir khyod kyis bdag la smra bar 'os min te //
analyzed: de phyir khyod kyis bdag la smra bar 'os min te //
translated: Therefore, it is not right for you to speak to me,

original: nges pa gang zhig gang la rab tu 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: nges pa gang zhig gang la rab tu 'jug pa'o //
translated: because of the certainty of what is to be entered by whom.

original: de nas dka' thub rnam par rgyu ba'i gnyis skyes des //
analyzed: de nas dka' thub rnam par rgyu ba'i gnyis skyes des //
translated: Then that twice-born one who roams in asceticism,

original: sh'akya'i khyu mchog khyu mchog rnam par gnon pa po //🔽de la rim gyis dka' thub khyad par rnams dang ni //
analyzed: sh'akya'i khyu mchog khyu mchog rnam par gnon pa po // de la rim gyis dka' thub khyad par rnams dang ni //
translated: to that bull of the Śākyas, the conqueror of bulls,🔽he gradually spoke words about the special austerities

original: dka' thub 'bras bu dang bcas gtam ngag byas pa'o //
analyzed: dka' thub 'bras bu dang bcas gtam ngag byas pa'o //
translated: and the fruits of asceticism.

original: grong byung bza' ba ma yin chu la rab skyes pa'i //
analyzed: grong byung bza' ba ma yin chu la rab skyes pa'i //
translated: The food of the forest, not to be eaten, the leaves that grow in water,

original: 'dab ma rnams dang chu dang 'bras bu rtsa ba nyid //
analyzed: 'dab ma rnams dang chu dang 'bras bu rtsa ba nyid //
translated: and water, fruits, and roots themselves,

original: thub pa rnams kyi spyod pa 'di ni lung ji ltar //
analyzed: thub pa rnams kyi spyod pa 'di ni lung ji ltar //
translated: This is the conduct of the sages, as it is taught in the scriptures.

original: dka' thub rnams kyi rnam rtog tha dad de de'o //
analyzed: dka' thub rnams kyi rnam rtog tha dad de de'o //
translated: It is the various austerities, and that.

original: kha cig ri dags bzhin du rtsva rnams la spyod la //
analyzed: kha cig ri dags bzhin du rtsva rnams la spyod la //
translated: Some live on grass like deer,

original: gzhan rnams bor ba yis ni mkha' la rgyu ba'i bya ltar 'tsho //
analyzed: gzhan rnams bor ba yis ni mkha' la rgyu ba'i bya ltar 'tsho //
translated: while others live like birds in the sky, on what is thrown away.

original: kha cig lag 'gro rnams dang lhan cig 'tsho ba ste //
analyzed: kha cig lag 'gro rnams dang lhan cig 'tsho ba ste //
translated: Some live together with reptiles,

original: grog mkhar gyur ba @25b rnams ni nags na rlung gis so //
analyzed: grog mkhar gyur ba @25b rnams ni nags na rlung gis so //
translated: while others in anthills in the forest, with the wind.

original: rdo yis rab 'bad bsgrub pa'i spyod pa gzhan rnams te //
analyzed: rdo yis rab 'bad bsgrub pa'i spyod pa gzhan rnams te //
translated: Others have a practice of striving with stones,

original: kha cig rang gi so yis nye bar blangs shing za //
analyzed: kha cig rang gi so yis nye bar blangs shing za //
translated: while some eat what they have gathered with their teeth.

original: de bzhin gzhan ni gzhan gyi don du bcos byas nas //
analyzed: de bzhin gzhan ni gzhan gyi don du bcos byas nas //
translated: Similarly, others, having prepared for the sake of others,

original: gal te lhag ma yod na bya ba byed pa'o //
analyzed: gal te lhag ma yod na bya ba byed pa'o //
translated: if there is a remainder, they act.

original: chu yis gsher ba'i ral pa'i tshogs can kha cig ni ;
analyzed: chu yis gsher ba'i ral pa'i tshogs can kha cig ni ;
translated: Some, with matted hair dripping with water,

original: / gsang sngags sngon 'gro lan gnyis me la sbyin sreg cing //
analyzed: / gsang sngags sngon 'gro lan gnyis me la sbyin sreg cing //
translated: twice recite the mantra before the fire offering.

original: kha cig nya dang mnyam par chu la rnams zhugs nas //
analyzed: kha cig nya dang mnyam par chu la rnams zhugs nas //
translated: Some, like fish, enter the water,🔽and some, like birds, in the sky.

original: rus sbal bzhin du lus rnams rab tu bskum pa'o //
analyzed: rus sbal bzhin du lus rnams rab tu bskum pa'o //
translated: Their bodies are bent like a tortoise.

original: de ltar dus su bsags pa'i dka' thub nags tshogs kyi //
analyzed: de ltar dus su bsags pa'i dka' thub nags tshogs kyi //
translated: Thus, by the supreme of the forest-dwellers, who have accumulated austerities over time,

original: mchog gis lhar 'gro gzhan gyis mi yi 'jig rten te ;
analyzed: mchog gis lhar 'gro gzhan gyis mi yi 'jig rten te ;
translated: one goes to the gods, and by the other, to the human world.

original: / sdug bsngal lam gyis bde ba nye bar thob phyir dang // chos kyi rtsa ba bde ba nyid du gsungs phyir ro //
analyzed: / sdug bsngal lam gyis bde ba nye bar thob phyir dang // chos kyi rtsa ba bde ba nyid du gsungs phyir ro //
translated: Because happiness is attained through the path of suffering, and because happiness itself is said to be the root of Dharma.

original: de skad ces sogs rkang gnyis dbang po'i sras po yis //
analyzed: de skad ces sogs rkang gnyis dbang po'i sras po yis //
translated: Thus spoke the son of the Lord of Men,

original: dka' thub nor dang ldan pa de yi tshig gsan nas //
analyzed: dka' thub nor dang ldan pa de yi tshig gsan nas //
translated: having heard the words of that one endowed with the wealth of austerities.

original: de nyid gzigs pa min yang ngoms par ma gyur la //
analyzed: de nyid gzigs pa min yang ngoms par ma gyur la //
translated: Though he did not see reality, he was not satisfied,

original: bdag tu song ba 'di ni dal bus gsungs par gyur //
analyzed: bdag tu song ba 'di ni dal bus gsungs par gyur //
translated: and this one who had gone to self spoke slowly:

original: sdug bsngal bdag nyid dka' thub rnam pa du ma ste //
analyzed: sdug bsngal bdag nyid dka' thub rnam pa du ma ste //
translated: Austerities are of many kinds, and suffering is their nature.

original: dka' thub bdag gi 'bras bu mtho ris gtso bo'o //
analyzed: dka' thub bdag gi 'bras bu mtho ris gtso bo'o //
translated: The fruit of austerities is the foremost of the heavens.

original: 'jig rten thams cad yongs su 'gyur ba dang ldan la //
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad yongs su 'gyur ba dang ldan la //
translated: The whole world is subject to change,

original: nyung ngu la ngal 'di ni gdung gnas rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: nyung ngu la ngal 'di ni gdung gnas rnams kyi'o //
translated: and this little hardship is for those who dwell in torment.

original: phangs pa rnams dang gnyen dang yul rnams bor nas ni //
analyzed: phangs pa rnams dang gnyen dang yul rnams bor nas ni //
translated: Abandoning their dear relatives and their country,

original: gang zhig mtho ris phyir ni rnam par spyod byed la //
analyzed: gang zhig mtho ris phyir ni rnam par spyod byed la //
translated: They practice for the sake of the higher realms.

original: de rnams rnam par bral te nges par 'gro 'dod la //
analyzed: de rnams rnam par bral te nges par 'gro 'dod la //
translated: But when they are separated from them, they are certain to go

original: slar yang shin tu 'ching ba chen po nyid yin no //🔽lus kyi ngal du ba gdung ba'i bya ba rnams kyis ni //
analyzed: slar yang shin tu 'ching ba chen po nyid yin no // lus kyi ngal du ba gdung ba'i bya ba rnams kyis ni //
translated: And are bound again by even stronger fetters.🔽They engage in the pursuit of sensual pleasures

original: 'dod pa'i rgyu las rab tu 'jug par 'dod pa'o ;
analyzed: 'dod pa'i rgyu las rab tu 'jug par 'dod pa'o ;
translated: Through the painful and exhausting activities of the body.

original: /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i skyon rnams yongs su mi rtog par //
analyzed: /'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i skyon rnams yongs su mi rtog par //
translated: Not reflecting on the faults of the ocean of saṃsāra,

original: sdug bsngal gyis de sdug bsngal kho na rjes su tshol //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyis de sdug bsngal kho na rjes su tshol //
translated: They suffer, and only seek out suffering.

original: 'chi bas skye dgu rnams kyis rtag par 'jigs pa ste //
analyzed: 'chi bas skye dgu rnams kyis rtag par 'jigs pa ste //
translated: All living beings are always afraid of death,

original: 'bad pa yis ni slar yang rab tu 'jug par 'dod //
analyzed: 'bad pa yis ni slar yang rab tu 'jug par 'dod //
translated: And yet they strive and engage in the pursuit of life.

original: rab tu zhugs par gyur na nges par 'chi ba ste //
analyzed: rab tu zhugs par gyur na nges par 'chi ba ste //
translated: But when they have engaged in it, they are certain to die,

original: 'di nyid du ni gang las 'jigs pa rnams lhung ngo //
analyzed: 'di nyid du ni gang las 'jigs pa rnams lhung ngo //
translated: And from that they will fall into fear.

original: 'di yi don du gcig rnams ngal bar rab 'jug cing //
analyzed: 'di yi don du gcig rnams ngal bar rab 'jug cing //
translated: For the sake of this, some people engage in exhausting activities,

original: gzhan rnams mtho ris don du ngal ba 'thob pa ste //
analyzed: gzhan rnams mtho ris don du ngal ba 'thob pa ste //
translated: Others, for the sake of heaven, are exhausted in their efforts.

original: bde ba'i don du sred pa'i bkren pa don ma byas //
analyzed: bde ba'i don du sred pa'i bkren pa don ma byas //
translated: For the sake of pleasure, they are poor in their craving for pleasure.

original: gson pa'i 'jig rten nges par don med nyid du lhung //🔽gang zhig dman pa dor nas khyad 'phags @26a * //
analyzed: gson pa'i 'jig rten nges par don med nyid du lhung // gang zhig dman pa dor nas khyad 'phags @26a * //
translated: The world of the living is certainly falling into meaninglessness.

original: 'gro ba can //
analyzed: 'gro ba can //
translated: Whoever abandons the inferior and goes to the excellent,

original: 'bad pa 'di ni nges par smad pa ma yin la //
analyzed: 'bad pa 'di ni nges par smad pa ma yin la //
translated: That effort is certainly not to be despised.

original: shes ldan rnams dang mnyam pa'i yongs su gdung ba yis //
analyzed: shes ldan rnams dang mnyam pa'i yongs su gdung ba yis //
translated: By the torment of being equal to the wise,

original: bya ba ma yin de 'dir slar yang byed pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba ma yin de 'dir slar yang byed pa'o //
translated: The unworthy is again made worthy here.

original: lus kyi gtser bas gal te 'dir ni chos yin na //
analyzed: lus kyi gtser bas gal te 'dir ni chos yin na //
translated: If, by the torment of the body, there is Dharma here,

original: lus kyi bde ba chos ma yin par 'gyur ba ste //
analyzed: lus kyi bde ba chos ma yin par 'gyur ba ste //
translated: The pleasure of the body would become non-Dharma.

original: pha rol du ni bde ba chos kyis kyang 'thob la //
analyzed: pha rol du ni bde ba chos kyis kyang 'thob la //
translated: But by Dharma, one obtains pleasure in the next world.

original: de phyir 'di yis chos kyi chos min 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: de phyir 'di yis chos kyi chos min 'bras bu'o //
translated: Therefore, by this, Dharma is the result of non-Dharma.

original: gang gi phyir na bsams pa'i dbang gis lus yin la //
analyzed: gang gi phyir na bsams pa'i dbang gis lus yin la //
translated: Because the body is under the power of thought,

original: rab tu 'jug pa dang ni zlog pa dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: rab tu 'jug pa dang ni zlog pa dag kyang ngo //
translated: And it is engaged and turned back.

original: de phyir sems kyi dul ba nyid ni rig pa ste //
analyzed: de phyir sems kyi dul ba nyid ni rig pa ste //
translated: Therefore, the discipline of the mind is knowledge.

original: sems las gzhan ba'i lus ni shing dang mnyas ba'o //
analyzed: sems las gzhan ba'i lus ni shing dang mnyas ba'o //
translated: The body, which is other than the mind, is like a piece of wood.

original: bza' ba gtsang bas gal te bsod nams 'dod na ni //
analyzed: bza' ba gtsang bas gal te bsod nams 'dod na ni //
translated: If you want merit, you should eat pure food.

original: de phyir ri dags rnams kyang bsod nams yod pa ste //🔽phyi rol skyes bu gang dag rnams kyang 'bras bu las //
analyzed: de phyir ri dags rnams kyang bsod nams yod pa ste // phyi rol skyes bu gang dag rnams kyang 'bras bu las //
translated: Therefore, even deer have merit,🔽because they are born outside the human race.

original: bskal pa'i nyes pas don rnams gzhan du kha bltas so //
analyzed: bskal pa'i nyes pas don rnams gzhan du kha bltas so //
translated: But because of the faults of the age, the results of actions are uncertain.

original: bsod nams phyir ni sdug bsngal mngon par mtshams sbyor na //
analyzed: bsod nams phyir ni sdug bsngal mngon par mtshams sbyor na //
translated: If you seek merit, you should seek out suffering.

original: 'on sdug bsngal mngon par mtshams sbyor tshad ma min //
analyzed: 'on sdug bsngal mngon par mtshams sbyor tshad ma min //
translated: But if you seek suffering, you are not a valid person.

original: de ltar gang dag las ni rnam par dag pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de ltar gang dag las ni rnam par dag pa'i phyir //
translated: Therefore, in order to purify your karma,

original: stegs zhes rab tu zhugs te chu la reg par byed //
analyzed: stegs zhes rab tu zhugs te chu la reg par byed //
translated: you should enter the water and touch the bottom.

original: de yang de yi snying la tshim pa tsam yin te //
analyzed: de yang de yi snying la tshim pa tsam yin te //
translated: But that is only to satisfy your heart;

original: chu yis sdig pa dag par byed pa ma yin phyir //🔽yon tan ldan bas rig pa'i chu ni gang dang gang //
analyzed: chu yis sdig pa dag par byed pa ma yin phyir // yon tan ldan bas rig pa'i chu ni gang dang gang //
translated: the water does not purify your sins.🔽If you want to make a ford in the water,

original: de dang de ni sa la gal te stegs 'dod na //
analyzed: de dang de ni sa la gal te stegs 'dod na //
translated: you should use the water of knowledge of the virtuous.

original: chu yang the tshom med par chu nyid kho na ste //
analyzed: chu yang the tshom med par chu nyid kho na ste //
translated: The water is water, and nothing else.

original: de phyir yon tan ldan rnams kho na stegs su go //
analyzed: de phyir yon tan ldan rnams kho na stegs su go //
translated: Therefore, only the virtuous are the bridge.

original: 'gron @27a * //
